item.title: What we know about Lisbon's deadly funicular crash
item.description: At least 16 people died after a carriage on the city's famous Gl√≥ria hillside railway derailed.

item.title: Boy, 3, pulled from funicular crash that has shocked Portugal
item.description: It is unclear what caused the crash in which 16 people died and more than 20 were injured, including many foreign nationals.

item.title: Lisbon funicular worker among those killed in crash
item.description: Four employees of a non-profit organisation and a transport worker are among those who died.

item.title: Rubio says US will 'blow up' foreign crime groups if needed
item.description: The secretary of state made the comments during a trip to Ecuador, where he announced new measures targeting criminal gangs.

item.title: Putin rejects Western security in Ukraine, warning troops would be target
item.description: The Russian leader's refusal comes after 26 countries pledged to deploy troops to Ukraine in the event of a ceasefire.
